title: [QUESTION]  What do i have to do when deploying on WPF
body:
The Problem

as soon as i install skiasharp via NuGet in a blank new WPF apllication i cant install it anymore after deployment. After clicking on setup and following a few steps a window appears saying:

"the validity of the application could not be checked. The process cannot continue"

On details is shows following error description:

"The strong name signature is not valid for the SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.Common.dll assembly."

What i have tried so far

created several blank wpf apps and repeated the same procedure on 3 diffrent maschines with same result
followed the instruction Here and Here without success.
Thank you for every hint you can give me!
